mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_num, book_id, member_id, quantity, cartDate) values (#{cart_num}, #{book_id}, #{member_id}, #{quantity}, #{cartDate})
mapper.select: select cart.cart_num, cart.book_id, cart.member_id, cart.quantity, book.book_name, book.book price, book.bImage from cart outer join book on cart.book_id = book.book_id where cart.member_id = #{cart.member_id}
